question: Can I keep lovebird as a pet? People saying that is it not jaaiz!
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Assalāmu `alaikum Warahmatullāhi Wabrakatuh,

It is permissible to keep a lovebird as a pet on condition one is able to take care of it

 

قال في المجتبي رامزا: لا بأس بحبس الطيور و الدجاج في بيته و لكن يعلفها و هو خير من ارسالها   في السكك. (شامي ج  ٦ ص ٤٠١)

 
And Allah Ta'āla Knows Best,
 
Muftī Ebrahim Desai
